sourceText: 777 (Crowley); Golden Dawn Knowledge Lectures; Regardie, The Golden Dawn
note: The Golden Dawn synthesis: alchemical stages from the Rosicrucian tradition combined with the seven liberal arts and Kabbalistic angel correspondences. The liberal arts represent the intellectual curriculum of ascent — each planet governs a mode of knowing.

Saturn.description: Burning away, structure, and the contemplation of celestial order

Jupiter.description: Dissolving into flow, expansion, and the knowledge of spatial form

Mars.description: Cutting and sorting, strength, and the harmony born of tension

Sun.description: The sacred marriage, illumination, and the science of number

Venus.description: Death and rebirth, beauty, and the art of persuasion

Mercury.description: Purification, communication, and the discipline of reasoning

Moon.description: Final integration, the foundation of language, and the completed Stone
